T11jithettu:1: pratyakṣam anumānaṃ ca sābhāsaṃ tv ātmasaṃvide //
T11jithettu:8: sapakṣa eva sattvam iti dvitīyaṃ rūpam /
T11jithettu:9: vipakṣe cāsattvam eva niścitam iti tṛtīyam //
T11jithettu:10: 4. tatra pakṣaḥ prasiddho dharmī prasiddheṇa viśeṣeṇa viśiṣṭaḥ svayaṃ sādhayitum iṣṭaḥ pratyakṣādyaviruddhaḥ /
T11jithettu:11: yathā śabdo dharmī anityatvena viśeṇa viśiṣtaḥ sādhyate kṛtakatvād iti hetuḥ //
T11jithettu:13: sādhyadharmeṇa sāmānyena samānaḥ sapakṣo yathā ghaṭādir iti //
T11jithettu:15: yatra sādhyābhāvena hetor abhāvo niyamena kathyate [ yathākāśādir iti //
T11jithettu:16: 7. etad eva ca hetos trirūpavacanaṃ parapratyāyanāya prayujyamānaṃ parārtham anumānam ucyate /
T11jithettu:17: yathā anityaḥ śabda iti pakṣavacanaṃ kṛtakatvād iti hetuvacanam /
T11jithettu:24: yat kṛtakaṃ tat sarvam anityaṃ dṛṣṭam /
T11jithettu:28: asaty anityatve na bhavaty eva kṛtakatvaṃ yathākāśādau /
T11jithettu:35: yathā dhūmādir dharmībuddhimatā hetunā janyata iti sādhye /
T11jithettu:42: nānumānaṃ pramāṇam iti parapratipādanāya vacanam uccāryamāṇaṃ parārtham anumānam ity uktatvāt //
T11jithettu:47: kiyatkālasthāyino 'pi kṛtakāḥ sarve nityā iti lokapratīteḥ //
T11jithettu:49: vaiśeṣikasya sāṃkhyaṃ prati vināśī śabda iti sādhye //
T11jithettu:51: sāṃkhyasya bauddhaṃ prati ātmā cetana iti sādhayataḥ //
T11jithettu:65: 25. tatra yo hetuḥ sapakṣavipakṣayor ubhayatrāsti nāsti vā saṃdihyate /
T11jithettu:68: 26. ubhayāsiddhaḥ tadyathā śabdasyānityatve sādhye cākṣuṣatvaṃ hetuḥ vādiprativādinor asiddhaḥ //
T11jithettu:69: 27. cetanās tarava iti sādhye sarvatvagapaharaṇe maraṇād iti hetuḥ prativādino bauddhasyāsiddha iti prativādyasiddhaḥ /
T11jithettu:72: utpattimattvād iti hetuḥ svayaṃ vādinaḥ sāṃkhyasyāsiddhaḥ /
T11jithettu:74: 29. vaiśeṣikasya bauddhaṃ prati kṣamādikaṃ dharmī kāryam iti sādhayataḥ pratikṣaṇaṃ sadṛśāparāparotpatter iti svayaṃ vādino 'siddhaḥ /
T11jithettu:75: utpattau siddhāyām api pratikṣaṇasadṛśāparāparotpattir ity asiddhaḥ //
T11jithettu:80: na hi sarve vṛkṣā rātrau patrasaṃkocabhājaḥ //
T11jithettu:81: 31. tathā pṛthivyādikaṃ dharmī buddhimaddhetujanyam iti sādhye kāryatvād iti hetur bauddhaṃ praty asiddhaḥ /
T11jithettu:82: pratyakṣānupalambhanibandhano hi kāryakāraṇabhāvo bauddhasya pṛthivyādau na siddhaḥ /
T11jithettu:84: 32. saṃdigdhāsiddho yathā yady ayaṃ dhūmo 'gnir atreti sādhye hetor evāniścayāt //
T11jithettu:86: iha bahuṣu nikuñjeṣu kvacid ekasmin nikuñje mayūra iti sādhye kekāyikād iti hetuḥ //
T11jithettu:87: 34. dharmyasiddhāv apy asiddho yathā ātmā dharmī sarvagata iti sādhye sarvatropalabhyamānaguṇatvād iti hetuḥ //
T11jithettu:90: 37. yathā śabdasya nityatvādike dharme sādhye prameyatvaṃ hetuḥ sapaksvipakṣayoḥ sarvatra vartamānaḥ sādhāraṇānaikāntikaḥ //
T11jithettu:91: 38. tathā śabdasya nityatve śrāvaṇatvaṃ hetuḥ sapakṣavipakṣayor apravartamānāt /
T11jithettu:95: aprayatnānantarīyakaḥ śabdasya vidyudākāśādiḥ sapakṣaḥ tatraikadeśe vidyudādau vartate 'nityatvaṃ nākāśādau prayatnāntarīyakaḥ punaḥ sarvo ghaṭādir vipakṣaḥ /
T11jithettu:98: 40. tathā prayatnānantarīyakatve śabdasya sādhye 'nityatvaṃ hetuḥ ghaṭādau sarvatra vidyate /
T11jithettu:101: tasmād ayaṃ vipakṣaikadeśavṛttiḥ sapakṣavyāpī hetur anaikāntikaḥ //
T11jithettu:103: śabde dharmiṇi nityatve sādhye 'mūrtatvād iti hetuḥ /
T11jithettu:105: tatraikadeśe 'mūrtatvam ākāśe pravartate na paramāṇau mūrtatvāt paramāṇūnam /
T11jithettu:108: 42. tathā saṃdigdhavipakṣavyāvṛttikaḥ sapakṣavyāpī hetur anaikāntiko yathā /
T11jithettu:109: kapilādidharmy asarvajña iti sādhye vaktṛtvād iti hetuḥ /
T11jithettu:112: sarvajñasyātīndriyatvād vacanam asti na veti saṃdigdham //
T11jithettu:113: 43. tathā saṃdigdhasapakṣavṛttir vipakṣavyāpl hetur anaikāntiko yathā /
T11jithettu:114: ṛṣabhavardhāmānādidharmī sarvajña iti sādhye kevaliśāstrakaraṇād iti hetuḥ sapakṣe sarvajñe saṃdigdhaḥ /
T11jithettu:117: 44. saṃdigdhānvayavyatirekahetur anaikāntiko yathā sātmakaṃ jīvaccharīraṃ prāṇādimattvād iti hetuḥ /
T11jithettu:118: jīvaccharīrasaṃbandhī prāṇādir na sātmake anātmake vā pravṛtto nivṛtto veti niścīyate //
T11jithettu:121: 46. tathā dvitīyo 'pi kevalavyatirekī nedaṃ nirātmakaṃ jīvaccharīram aprāṇādimattvaprasaṅgād iti /
T11jithettu:122: dṛṣṭāntābhāvād eva nānvayaniścayo nāpi vyatirekaniścaya iti saṃśayahetuḥ //
T11jithettu:125: 49. yathā śabdo dharmī nitya iti sādhyo dharmaḥ kṛtakatvād ākāśādivat /
T11jithettu:126: ayaṃ hetur ghaṭādau vipakṣa evāsti na sapakṣe //
T11jithettu:127: 50. tathā śabdo dharmī nitya iti sādhye prayatnānantarīyakatvād iti hetur ākāśādau sapakṣe nāsty eva /
T11jithettu:131: cakṣurādaya iti dharmī parārthā iti sādhyo dharmaḥ saṃghatatvād iti hetuḥ /
T11jithettu:133: ayaṃ tu hetur yathā cakṣurādīnāṃ pārārthyaṃ sādhayati /
T11jithettu:136: 52. dharmisvarūpaviparītasādhano yathā pṛthivyādir dharmī buddhimaddhetujanya iti sādhye sāśrayatvād iti hetuḥ /
T11jithettu:138: ayaṃ hetur yathā buddhimaddhetujanyatvaṃ sādhayati tathā buddhimataḥ kartuḥ sāśrayatvam api sādhayati //
T11jithettu:140: vaiśeṣikasya mīmāṃsakaṃ praty ātmā dharmī cetayata iti sādhye (Htu 267)
T11jithettu:141: cetanādhiṣṭhānatvād iti hetur ātmano 'cetanasya yathā caitanyaṃ sādhayati /
T11jithettu:142: tathā hetur ayam anityatvam api sādhayati /
T11jithettu:145: 55. viruddhāvyabhicārī nāma na kaścid dhetudoṣo 'stīti na tasyodāharaṇaṃ yuktam /
T11jithettu:147: yat sarvadeśāvasthitaiḥ svayaṃ ca svasaṃbandhibhir yugapad abhisaṃbadhyate tat sarvagatam /
T11jithettu:149: abhisaṃbadhyate ca sarvadeśāvasthitaiḥ svasaṃbandhibhir yugapat sāmānyam iti pailukasya svabhāvahetuprayogaḥ / /
T11jithettu:151: yad upalabdhilakṣaṇaprāptaṃ yatra nopalabhyate na tatrāsti /
T11jithettu:154: anupalambho hetuḥ pūrvoktaś ca svabhāvaḥ parasparaṃ bādhayataḥ /
T11jithettu:156: 56. na sapakṣād anyo dṛṣṭānto nāma kaścid iti sapakṣa eva sādharmyadṛṣṭāntaḥ //
T11jithettu:168: (Htu 268) tatra dṛṣṭānte rathyāpuruṣe rāgādimattvaṃ saṃdigdhaḥ paracetovṛttīnāṃ duranvayatvāt //
T11jithettu:170: kaścit puruṣo maraṇadharma iti sādhye rāgādimattvād iti hetuḥ /
T11jithettu:173: 63. saṃdigdhobhayadharmā dṛṣṭāntābhāso yathā kaścit puruṣo dharmī asarvajña iti sādhye rāgādimattvād iti hetuḥ /
T11jithettu:181: atra vidyamāno 'py anvayo vyāptyā na darśita iti /
T11jithettu:184: yad anityaṃ tat kṛtakaṃ ghaṭādivad ity atrānityatvaṃ sādhyam /
T11jithettu:186: na tu sādhanena vyāptaṃ sādhyaṃ kathyate /
T11jithettu:192: atra paramāṇor vaidharmyadṛṣṭāntatvād amūrtatvaṃ sādhanadharmo vyāvṛtto (Htu 269)
T11jithettu:202: atrākāśādau vaidharmyadṛṣṭāntāt sādhyaṃ sādhanaṃ ca na vyāvṛttam //
T11jithettu:209: yaḥ sarvajñaḥ sa jyotirjñānādikam upadiṣṭavān yathā ṛṣabhavardhamānādir iti /
T11jithettu:210: atra vaidharmyodāharaṇād ṛṣabhavardhamānāder asarvajñatā nivṛttāna veti saṃdehaḥ //
T11jithettu:212: nātra trayīvidā brāhmaṇena grāhyavacanaḥ kapilakaṇādādiḥ puruṣo rāgādimattvād iti /
T11jithettu:213: atra vaidharmyodāharaṇaṃ ye grāhyavacanā na te rāgādimanto yathā gautamādayo dharmaśāstrāṇāṃ praṇetāra iti gautamādibhyo rāgādimattvasya dharmasya vyāvṛttiḥ saṃdigdhā //
T11jithettu:216: atra vaidharmyodāharaṇaṃ yo vītarāgo na tasya parigrahāgrahau saṃbhavataḥ (Htu 270)
T11jithettu:218: ṛṣabhāder vaidharmyadṛṣṭāntāt avītarāgatvaṃ sādhyadharmaḥ parigrahāgrahayogaḥ sādhanadharmo vyāvṛtto na veti saṃdehaḥ /
T11jithettu:221: tau ca dvāv api ṛṣabhādau saṃbhavyete /
T11jithettu:226: yatrāvītarāgatvaṃ nāsti na sa vaktā yathopalakhaṇḍa iti /
T11jithettu:227: yady upalakhaṇḍād ayaṃ vyāvṛttas tathāpi sarvo vītarāgo vakteti saṃdehaḥ //
T11jithettu:230: paramārthataḥ saṃyag dṛṣṭānto 'py ayaṃ vaktṛdoṣād dṛṣṭāntābhāsaḥ /
T11jithettu:232: tathā hi yan nityaṃ tat sarvaṃ niyamenākṛtakaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ yathākāśādir iti vacanena vibhajya vaktrā vyāptipūrvako vyātireko na pradarśita ity apradarśitavyatirekaḥ
T11jithettu:234: yad akṛtakaṃ tan nityaṃ dṛṣṭam iti /
T11jithettu:235: atra sādhananivṛttyā sādhyanivṛttir vyāptā darśayitavyā tena yatra yatra sādhyanivṛttis tatra tatra niyamena sādhananivṛttiḥ sidhyatīti //
T11jithettu:238: vādinā sādhayitum iṣṭam arthaṃ na sādhayantīti sādhanābhāsā (Htu 271)
T11jithettu:240: evaṃ ca prativādinā dūṣaṇatvenopanyastā dūṣaṇāni bhavanti /
T11jithettu:242: sādhanasya nyūnatodbhāvanam eva dūṣaṇasya lakṣaṇaṃ vibhajya pṛthag ucyate /
T11jithettu:245: yadā pūrvapakṣavādī mithyādūṣaṇatvena pratipādayatīti tadā dūṣaṇābhāsā jātaya iti paṭhyante /
T11jithettu:248: aduṣṭadṛṣṭānte dṛṣṭāntadoṣopādānaṃ dūṣaṇābhāsa iti nyāyāt / J
T11jithettu:249: 84. tatra pratijñāhetudāharaṇopanayanigamanāni pañcāvayavaṃ paraiḥ sādhanam ucyate /
T11jithettu:250: yathānityaḥ śabda iti pratijñā kṛtakatvād iti hetuḥ /
T11jithettu:251: yat kṛtakaṃ tat sarvam anityaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ yathā ghaṭādīty udāharaṇam /
T11jithettu:254: dṛṣṭānte pratītisamartho hetur dharmiṇy upanīyata ity upanayaḥ /
T11jithettu:258: 85. tathā hi / vādakāle vyāptipūrvaka eva prayogaḥ kartavyaḥ /
T11jithettu:259: yat kṛtakaṃ tat sarvam anityaṃ dṛstaṃ yathā ghaṭādir iti /
T11jithettu:260: sādhyena sādhanasya dṛṣṭānte vyāptikathanam anvaya ucyate //
T11jithettu:261: 86. vipakṣe ca sādhyanivṛttyā sādhananivṛttir vyatireka ucyate yathāsaty anityatve na bhavaty eva kṛtakatvaṃ yathākāśādau /
T11jithettu:265: 88. tathā sādharmyavati prayoge 'nvayābhidhānasāmarthyād eva vyatireko 'vagantavya iti na pṛthag ucyate /
T11jithettu:266: yathā yat kṛtakaṃ tat sarvam anityaṃ draṣṭavyam /
T11jithettu:270: tathā vaidharmyavati prayoge vyatirekoktisāmarthyād evānvayaḥ pratipanna iti nānvayaḥ punar ucyate /
T11jithettu:271: yan nityaṃ tad akṛtakaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ yathākāśādiḥ kṛtakaś ca śabda iti /
T11jithettu:276: pratigatam āśritam akṣaṃ yad vijñānaṃ tat pratyakṣam /
T11jithettu:278: atyādayaḥ krāntādyarthe dvitiyayeti samāsena pratyakṣaśabdo vācyaliṅgaḥ siddhaḥ /
T11jithettu:281: 91. cakṣuḥśrotraghrāṇajihvākāyākhyāni pañcendriyāṇi tadāśritāni pañca jñānāni pramāṇāni /
T11jithettu:283: 92. tac ca pratyakṣaṃ nāmajātyādikalpanārahitaṃ nirvikalpakam abhrāntaṃ ca yadi bhavati /
T11jithettu:293: śuktikāyāṃ rajatajñānaṃ sthāṇur ayaṃ puruṣo veti jñānam /
T11jithettu:299: 95. tasya viṣayaḥ svalakṣaṇam arthakriyāsamarthaṃ tu svalakṣaṇam ucyate /
T11jithettu:302: pramāṇam arthapratītirūpaṃ phalaṃ ca tādṛśam eva /
T11jithettu:306: gṛhīte ca pakṣadharme smṛte ca sādhyasādhanabhāve paścāt pratipattā yathārthaṃ pratipadyate yena tat svārtham anumānam /
T11jithettu:309: 100. siddhe hi kāryakāraṇabhāve kāryaṃ hetur draṣṭavyaḥ /
T11jithettu:312: asti ceha dhūma iti [ asaty agnau na bhavaty eva dhūmo yathā sajalapradeśe /
T11jithettu:317: asati vṛkṣatve na bhavaty eva śiṃśapātvam /
T11jithettu:319: atrāpi vyāpyavyāpakabhāve niścite sati vyāpyo hetur draṣṭavyaḥ //
T11jithettu:323: atrāpi dṛṣyānupalambho dṛṣyābhavena vyāpto yadā niścitas tadāyaṃ hetur gamakaḥ //
T11jithettu:327: sāmānyatodṛṣṭaṃ ceti paraiḥ kalpitam anumānaṃ sarvam anumānābhāsaḥ //
T11jithettu:328: teṣu tādātmyatadutpattilakṣaṇasya pratibandhābhāvāt [ siddhe saty eva hi kāryakāraṇabhāve vyāpyavyāpakabhāve ca sādhyasādhanabhāvo nānyathā vyabhicārasaṃbhavāt //
T11jithettu:329: 104. yathā vṛṣṭimān ayaṃ megho gambhīradhvanatvād iti /
T11jithettu:331: 105. yathopari vṛṣṭo devo nadīpūradarśanāt bandhabhaṅgādināpi nadīpūrasya darśaṇāt //
T11jithettu:332: 106. yathā pakvā ete taṇḍulā ekasthālyantargatatvād dṛṣṭataṇḍulavat //
T11jithettu:335: atra bhūyo darśane 'pi sādhyasādhanayor vyabhicārasaṃbhava eva //
T11jithettu:336: 108. yathā yat pārthivaṃ tat sarvaṃ lohalekhyaṃ dṛṣṭam /
T11jithettu:341: 110. yathā yad dravad dravyam ārdrakṛt tad dṛṣṭaṃ yathodakaṃ /
